column5: Any one own one and what is your comment in it? Can you tell me where can I get one near Toronto area?  Thanks in advance!
I had the 2 man. OK for lightweight components, but the workmanship could be a lot better. Spent a lot of time restitching the fabric seams and the shoulderstraps on the backpack.
Had one, used it once and returned it. Didn't like it.
We have two down at Gagnon Sports my friend. I'll check prices out and get back to you.
